summary: adds standalone camouflaged dark brotherhood armors. Snow and forest variants.
descriptionHtml:
adds standalone camouflaged dark brotherhood armors. it comes with Snow and forest variants.
you can find them in dark brotherhood sanctuary, right in the first room. you can\'t miss them. they have same stats as normal DB armor, but with little better enchantments. not overpowered!

<-o->!PLEASE UPLOAD YOU\'R OWN IMAGES!<-o->

TO-DO
-make those textures better ;)

credits go to:

-- daisukekazama -> for snow camoflage texture http://daisukekazama.deviantart.com/art/Hexcam-Cfb-hi-Winter-Cfb-213077671
-- r2rex -> for the idea
-- me -> for everything else
author: GLAD0S
